path.style: fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: url(#gradient-0); stroke-width: 10px;

rect.style: stroke: rgb(255, 115, 0); stroke-width: 10px; fill: none; stroke-linejoin: round;
stroke: rgb(255, 115, 0); stroke-width: 10px; fill: none; stroke-linejoin: round;
